page.title: 14PATERNOSTER'S, WARNINGLID
page.content: { Mr.Chandler}is the{manager}of {Paternosters Apple Farm.}He works for {Mr.Gardener}who owns the farm. Mr.Chandler has worked there for{34 {years.}He starts{work}at{8:OOa.m.}and finishes at{5:OOp.m. Mr.Chandler has two full time workers.He is in charge of{170 acres of farm land altogether. They grow{apples ,plums,raspberries, {blackcurrants,gooseberries,plums,tay {berries and logan berries.}He grows apples on 3O acres;4 acres of plums and 3 acres of raspberries. His machinery is an orchard cutter, 2 sprayers, a cultivator, a subsoiler, a buckrake, a forklift and 2 tractors. He produces{1O,OOO bushels of apples. He sends{2/3 to the packhouse.}These apples are picked by casual workers. The rest & the soft fruit is sold to people who come to{pick their own.
